actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health and Environment.

official_title: To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to require State Medicaid programs to provide coverage of screening mammography and screening pap smears.
short_title: Medicaid Women's Basic Health Coverage Act of 1997

summary.text: Medicaid Women's Basic Health Coverage Act of 1997 - Amends title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act (SSA) to provide State Medicaid coverage of: (1) screening mammographies for women age 35 and older conducted in accordance with the frequency guidelines established by the Omnibus Budget Reconciliation Act of 1990 for coverage of screening mammographies under the Medicare program (SSA title XVIII); and (2) screening pap smears.

titles.title: Medicaid Women's Basic Health Coverage Act of 1997
To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to require State Medicaid programs to provide coverage of screening mammography and screening pap smears.
